nodes.description: The nodes this item can contains

sub-schema.description: Use a generated sub schema at this point. The sub schemas exists for each implementation. If you use this member all settings in nodes will be ignored.

description.description: The description that should be shown in the editor

variables.description: The list of supported variables. This is an object with the key as the variable names and the values are the description.

root.description: Specify if this node and all sub-nodes are allowed to be contained in the root resource file. The following settings exists: `root`=only in root; `theme`=only in theme files; `default`=both files are allowed

fallback.description: If no value for this is set the language system will fallback to the specified text. The value is the absolute key for the fallback text.
